com.joliciel.talismane.utils.io

Class DirectoryReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.Reader
      • com.joliciel.talismane.utils.io.DirectoryReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CurrentFileProvider, java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.lang.Readable

    public class DirectoryReader
extends java.io.Reader
implements CurrentFileProvider
    A reader which reads through all the files in a given directory structure.
    Author:
    Assaf Urieli
